name: School Coven
description:
A visual novel following a young woman as she transfers into a new college for her final year of study.

Missing the start of term she is left with few choices for after school clubs, leading her to join the Dark Research Club, believing it to be a late night study group when in fact it is a coven of young wannabe witches.

Features:
  • A Yuri Love Story
  • Witches & Magic
  • Hi-jinks & Mischief
  • Multiple Routes to Explore
  • A variety of endings to unlock
